home.subHeading: Revolutionize the way your financial institution operates. Experience faster decision-making, streamlined operations, and enhanced customer engagement with FinRule.
home.intro: FinRule is the next-generation Loan Origination System (LOS) built for midsize banks and credit unions. Our intelligent automation platform enables financial institutions to digitize and optimize every step of the lending journey—from online applications and credit analysis to digital document management and compliance tracking.
home.experience: Experience intelligent lending. Request a demo today or explore how FinRule can fit into your banking infrastructure.

companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.content: FinRule is a financial technology company headquartered in the United States, offering AI- powered, cloud-native software solutions that modernize lending operations. Designed specifically for banks with assets ranging from $1 billion to $10 billion, our mission is to help institutions operate with the agility of fintechs while ensuring enterprise-grade reliability and compliance.

items.innovation: Continually enhancing features through user feedback and emerging technology.
items.integrity: Prioritizing secure, transparent, and regulatory-compliant operations.
items.partnership: Viewing every client relationship as a long-term collaboration.
items.scalability: Ensuring our solutions grow alongside your institution.

ourJourney.title: Our Journey
ourJourney.content: Founded by banking transformation veterans, FinRule was created to solve the inefficiencies of legacy LOS systems and to deliver a digital-first solution that simplifies operations while maintaining strict compliance.

leadershipTeam.title: Leadership Team
leadershipTeam.content: Our executive team includes experts with decades of combined experience in banking technology, credit risk management, regulatory strategy, and enterprise software development.

form.title: CONNECT WITH US
form.description: We’re here to help you streamline your lending and strengthen your bank’s competitive advantage. Reach out for a consultation, partnership inquiry, or product demo.

product.heading: PRODUCT
product.description: FinRule’s Loan Origination System is engineered for digital lending at scale. The platform provides robust automation across every step of the loan lifecycle—allowing lenders to reduce manual work, increase underwriting precision, and meet growing customer expectations for seamless, online services.

workflow.title: Custom Workflow Management
points: Configure workflows for retail, commercial, or SME loans.
Enable branch-specific or centralized decision-making processes.

ai.title: AI-Enhanced Underwriting
points: Analyze risk using automated financial spreading and integrated third-party data sources.
Generate credit scores, risk ratings, and term sheets instantly.

etrr.title: ETRR (Electronic Tax Return Reader)
points: Instantly parse and capture borrower data from uploaded tax returns.
Eliminate data entry and reduce errors in income verification.

compliance.title: Digital Compliance Engine
points: Track all activities in real-time audit logs.
Get automatic alerts for any deviation from FDIC or CFPB guidelines.

integrations.title: Real-Time Integrations
points: API access to core systems (e.g., FIS, Encompass).

conclusion.paragraph: Designed for ease of use with a modern UI, intuitive dashboards, and customizable role-based views.

industryChallenges.title: Industry Challenges:
industryChallenges.description: Banks face increasing pressure to digitize while managing regulatory complexity and aging infrastructure. FinRule offers targeted solutions to overcome these issues, including:
industryChallenges.point1: Manual loan origination processes that slow down operations.
industryChallenges.point2: Fragmented systems leading to compliance gaps.

howWeHelp.title: How FinRule Helps:
howWeHelp.point1: Provides a single platform for customer intake, document collection, credit decisioning, and loan closing.
howWeHelp.point2: Automates compliance with intelligent audit trails and reporting.
howWeHelp.point3: Reduces loan cycle time from weeks to days.

useCases.title: Real-World Use Cases:
useCases.point2: Small business loan origination with SBA forms
useCases.point3: Retail loan application portals with auto-decisioning
